Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the countryside, the ideals he intensively pursued before his death, and the tremendous chaos and angst in the world after World War II.
